div.ab:
الحمد للّه وبه ـى توفيقي
ليوعز كافّة الأمرا الولاة نصرهم
اللّه وأظفرهم وأحسن عونهم وتوفيقهم
بحمل رافعيها فيما سألوه على ما جرت به
عادتهم وليكون نزولهم بحيث مستقر
من تقدّمهم من الولاة ولا يمكّنوا من
العربان ولا غيرهم من التّعرّض إلى
دياراتهم وموضع صلواتهم ورعاية
ما يخصّهم وحفظهم وصونهم وليمنعوا
من يتطرّق إليهم بأذيّة وليقر بأيديهم
بعد العمل به إن شا اللّه تعالي

ăl ḥamdu li l lāhi wa bi hi *** tawfīq ī *****
li yūʿaza kāffaẗu ăl ʾumarāʾi ăl wulāẗi naṣara humu
ăl lāhu wa ʾaẓfara hum wa ʾaḥsana ʿawna hum wa tawfīqa hum
bi ḥamli rāfiʿī hā fī mā saʾalū hu ʿalà mā ǧarat bi hi
ʿādatu hum wa l yakūn nuzūlu hum bi ḥayṯu mustaqarru
man taqaddama hum mina ăl wulāẗi wa lā yumakkinū mina
ăl ʿurbāni wa lā ġayri him mina ăt taʿarruḍi ʾilà
diyārāti him wa mawḍiʿi ṣalawāti him wa riʿāyaẗi
mā yaḫuṣṣu hum wa ḥifẓi him wa ṣawni him wa l yamnaʿū
man yataṭarraqu ʾilay him bi ʾaḏiyyaẗ:in wa l yaqirri bi ʾaydī him
baʿda ăl ʿamali bi hi ʾin šāʾa ăl lāhu taʿālà

Praise be to God and through Him [is my] ......
Let all military governors (May God aid them,
make them victorious and grant them help and success)
enjoin that the petitioners be treated in the matter of their request according to what has been customary for them
in the past. Let them reside where
former governors have established themselves and let them not enable any of
the Bedouins or others to interfere with
their [the monks'] buildings and place of worship and let them respect
their property, protect and guard them; let them prevent
any who would bring harm to them. Let it [this document] remain in their hands
after it has been acted upon, if God Almighty wills it!
